item.description:
(Great news!) I just got off the phone and we have confirmation that Scott Wilson, the President of the Connecticut Citizens Defense league and John Beidler, the Connecticut Oath Keepers State Chapter President will be our guest speakers at our next Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting January 15th, 7 p.m. at Sonoma Grille & Pub 7366 Post Road, North Kingstown, RIÂ  02852.
You know how important this is, let's show our neighbors to the West that Rhode Island cares about liberty! (Limited seating RSVP now to reserve your spot.)

CCDL Mission Statement

The Connecticut Citizens Defense League is a non-partisan, grassroots organization devoted to advocating rights affirmed by the Constitutions of the United States of America and the State of Connecticut. We are especially dedicated to protecting the unalienable right of all citizens to keep and bear arms, for the defense of both self and state, through public enlightenment and legislative action.

We welcome anyone who believes that the defense of our constitutional rights is critical to the longevity of our freedom and to the success of this nation, and in particular that the rights to self defense and to keep and bear the arms to actualize that defense, are fundamental and undeniable.
http://www.ccdl.us/

"Yours in Liberty"

Rhode Island Oath Keepers

Acting State Chapter President

Randy Swanson

401-952-5015

RIOathKeepers@verizon.net
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
